functions.name: Get Talent Layer Users
functions.description: Returns all users that have minted a TalentLayer ID

functions.name: Get Talent experienced in a topic
functions.description: Returns all users that already work at least a given number of times times on a given topic project on TalentLayer protocol

functions.name: Get most rated talent
functions.description: Returns all users that completed work at least a given number of times times with a minimum given rating on TalentLayer protocol

args.name: minRating
args.description: The selected minimum rating, from 0 to 5
